Wed, 22 Jan 2025 03:31:25 +0000 The missing 'G' from Gisborne's 'Gizzy' sign has been taken in for repairs after it was damaged. Photo / James Pocock

Wed, 22 Jan 2025 03:00:00 +0000 The 658-passenger Azamara Pursuit made for a spectacular sight as she left Northport on Saturday night, the first cruise ship to visit Whangārei in 2025.

Wed, 22 Jan 2025 02:43:26 +0000 Turipapa Tukere, 42, died after a gang brawl on December 27.
